author: A_Brickset_user
title: Nice but expensive
review:
The figs are nice, but 8 euro for this set is too expensive.
It has 3 figs and 3 stand-up's and 3 stupid collecters cards, It's no Pokemon. I have one face used for a black pirate. There were ofcourse also black pirates.
 
To MortalKombatkid@Hotmail.com
Bedankt voor je aanbod, maar m'n email doet het op dit ogenblik niet zo goed.

author: DarthVader_
title: Cool starter basket ball set!
review: I got this set probaly in 2007 at a local store that sells old Lego sets!  It was cool!  I got it for one cent!  It was weird!  I liked having three real guys, but as lego mini figs!  This is a cool set!

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Sports (Basketball) - NBA Collectors #2 Review
review:
This set may doesn't have any play features but it's a good one to have. We get 3 minifigs which are famous NBA basketball players. The players are: Tony Parker, Antoine Walker and Shaquille O'Neal. We also get a card and a stand for each figure. This set has a good collector's value but I would still recommend you to get the bigger sets of this theme first before you get this one.

All in all this set is an good set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
